articles.title: Funds for fintech cos hit 3-year low at $2 bn | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Fintech funding in India declined by 63% in 2023, reaching a total of $2 billion. Only five rounds surpassed the $100 million mark. The decline is attributed to high borrowing costs and challenging macroeconomic factors. InCred was the only unicorn in 2023.
